meanings.definition: Situated before or at the front of something
meanings.sent1: The anterior part of the classroom is where the teacher's desk is placed.
meanings.sent2: The anterior door of the house leads to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The cat always sits in the anterior row of chairs during family movie nights.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an anterior light guiding him through the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The anterior position in line guarantees the best view of the stage.

meanings.definition: Coming before in time or order
meanings.sent1: The anterior chapters of the book introduce the main characters.
meanings.sent2: The anterior events in history shaped the world we live in today.
meanings.sent3: The alarm clock's anterior ringing always wakes me up before sunrise.
meanings.sent4: His anterior dreams of success motivated him to work hard every day.
meanings.sent5: The anterior days of summer bring warmth and joy to our hearts.

meanings.definition: Located near the front of the body
meanings.sent1: The anterior teeth are used for biting and chewing food.
meanings.sent2: The anterior part of the brain controls voluntary movements.
meanings.sent3: The anterior pockets of his jacket always hold his favorite snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the room, originating from an anterior corner.
meanings.sent5: The anterior position of the heart protects it within the chest cavity.
